item.title: Personal Web Using Hugo
item.description: #Hugo #GitHub #Website Hugo is a framework to generate statics website, and Github is to publish the website. This article demonstrates using Hugo and GitHub to setup a personal website. It’s easy to maintain and clear to read. Preparing Create a repository on GitHub We can upload our website to various servers though, I use GitHub to hold my personal website since it’s free. Creating a repository for personal website is slightly different from normal repository.
